HomePage.title: The First Dominican Republic University Division Winners at NASA's Human Exploration Rover Challenge
HomePage.stemVisitSubtitle: Complete the form for your Educational Center
HomePage.sponsorUsSubtitle: The team needs your help to win!

HERCSimulation.title: NASA HERC Simulation
HERCSimulation.description: On this Simulation, you will indulge into the competition team Apolo 27 will go through in Huntsville, Alabama. Learn the obstacles and tasks our Rover will face and help us get first in the shortest time possible! We trust you on this mission!

MathGame.title: Math Temple
MathGame.description: Run, jump, and solve! Conquer the Math Temple with your arithmetic prowess. Math challenges await! Can you escape the temple with your math skills?

ScienceGame.title: Little Alchemy
ScienceGame.description: Unleash your inner scientist! Combine elements to discover the secrets of nature. Become a master of the elements.

TechnologyGame.title: Space Typing Hero
TechnologyGame.description: Defend the galaxy with your typing skills! Type fast, shoot faster! Save the universe from alien invaders.

games.title: NASA HERC Simulation
games.caption: Experience the NASA HERC with your own device.

games.title: Big Alchemy
games.caption: Discover the elements that surround us.

games.title: Space Typing Hero
games.caption: Learn to use your keyboard like a pro.

games.title: Math Temple
games.caption: Improve your math skills in the mysterious Math Temple.

podcast.title: Podcast
podcast.name: Caribe STEM
podcast.description: Caribe STEM is a podcast created to share and disseminate STEM (science, technology, engineering, and mathematics) in the Dominican Republic and throughout Latin America. Created by Apolo 27, the university team representing INTEC in the NASA HERC competition.

Sponsors.title: Sponsor Us
Sponsors.subtitle: Your support will help us get our country the recognition it deserves.

youtube.description: Our videos showcase the engineering prowess and dedication that led us to become four-time category winners at HERC. Join us behind the scenes to see our innovative designs and the challenges we overcame.
youtube.continue: to stay updated on our latest projects and events.
